name: Distant Dreams: A Buddy Jam Game
name_original: Distant Dreams: A Buddy Jam Game
description:
Join Kyle in an amazing adventure as you both learn about the dangers of dreams. But be careful though! Your worst nightmare has other plans. Remember, if you die in your dreams, you die in real life.

Controls

W A S D - Move

Shift - Shield (watch out! Your shield doesn't activate right away!)

Gameplay

Watch out for Evil-Kyle, he shoots out flames that chase you around the map, but don't go too far! The Landscape is closing in around you, if you don't defeat Evil-Kyle in time, it'll engulf you and everything else. Blue orbs that Evil-Kyle shoots can be bounced back at him! Defeat him, and you get an amazing reward (reward is not guaranteed to be included)!

Credits

Coding, design and some art - 398 (that's me!)

Music and some art - Audonas
